item.title: Introducing the JasperFx Software YouTube Channel
item.description: JasperFx Software is in business to help our clients make the most of the “Critter Stack” tools, Event Sourcing, CQRS, Event Driven Architecture, Test Automation, and server side .NET development in general. We’d be happy to talk with your company and see how we could help you be more successful! Jeffry Gonzalez and I have … Continue reading Introducing the JasperFx Software YouTube Channel → Link to article: https://jeremydmiller.com/2025/01/26/introducing-the-jasperfx-software-youtube-channel/

item.title: Wringing More Scalability out of Event Sourcing with the Critter Stack
item.description: JasperFx Software works with our customers to help wring the absolute best results out of our customer’s usage of the “Critter Stack.” We build several improvements in collaboration with our customers last year to both Marten and Wolverine specifically to improve scalability of large systems using Event Sourcing. If you’re concerned about whether or not … Continue reading Wringing More Scalability out of Event Sourcing with the Critter Stack →
